The Department of Public Works (DPW) is responsible for a variety of infrastructure assets in their respective municipality. Typically, DPW is responsible for plowing the roads when it snows, filling potholes, cleaning and maintaining sewers, managing street lights, and working on larger capital improvement projects like reconstructing roads, sewers, and more.
